ygData.subject: RE: Macroing skills
ygData.msgSnippet: Wah kow like tat also need to contribute ah.  Then all must contribute to Ziltus Fundation Fund for Local Kakis Community - for the time I spend on maxing all
ygData.messageBody:
Wah kow like tat also need to contribute ah. Then all must contribute to
Ziltus Fundation Fund for Local Kakis Community - for the time I spend on
maxing all trade skills while u guys come out for the cash, hehe.

I know where is the bare head goo goo house in FP lah, I will go there
macro once I finish with my smith training tonight, hehe.

Btw, dun try to macro in the Paladin pool, inside got those fishes tat eat
meat (cant remember their name). Or else the next day morning when u look
at char u find ya most impt part missing and ya lower body is bleeding,
hahahah.

Ziltus

On Friday, 16 July, 1999 3:07 PM, Alex [SMTP:leealex@...] wrote:
> From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>
> I macro swim from 1lvl to 32 at monks guild pool, shallow and safe.
>
> HH pass also got one. i swm from 40 to 78 liao. where teh spot?
> Ah..for that u gotta contribute 10pp to the Yiyang Monastary of the High
> cloud WuShu temple located at the altered plane of mon-eyes, at fifth
lvl,
> section 24, rm 888, table 1, box 6....or simply give me 9 pp and i'll put
it
> in for u. I''l add in the balance 1pp for ya too... see.. how nice i
> am.......at least i dont sing song and take coxk.
>
> Yiyang at high cloud WuShu temple
>
>
> -----Original Message-----

getting

swim
